H0.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1985

H3.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1986

A4.text: On 28 February 1986, at 23:21 CET (22:21 UTC), Olof Palme, Prime Minister of Sweden, was fatally wounded by a single gunshot while walking home from a cinema with his wife Lisbeth Palme on the central Stockholm street Sveav√§gen.
